articles.author: Jeffrey Clark
articles.title: Kamala Harris stumbles over her words in Ghana speech: 'A lot of that work is the work that I am here to do' - Fox News
articles.description: Kamala Harris delivered another halting, repetitive speech, this time in Ghana as part of the Biden administration's push to build closer ties with Africa.
articles.content:
Vice President Kamala Harris
 stumbled over her words during a speech in Ghana Monday, serving up yet another word salad on the world stage. 
"There are a number of things on the issue of the econo… [+2207 chars]
